full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Request for Proposal (RFP) Notice
---

**Notice Title:** 
Tender Notice: Engineering Graduate, Intermediate 

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01015597
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-TSPS2023-14
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Procurement Details:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a two-year contract with options to extend for an additional three years.

**Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
**Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Open Bid
**Notice Period:** This tender is open to pre-qualified suppliers.

**Description of Requirement:**
We are seeking a Core and Non-Core Intermediate Engineering Graduate to provide project engineering services and assist the CH146 Project and Obsolescence Manager. The selected candidate must have the ability to complete 240 days of work per year.

**Pre-Qualified Suppliers List:**
The list of suppliers who have been pre-qualified to bid on this contract includes:

- 9468269 Canada Corp.
- Access Corporate Technologies Inc.
- ...
\*Please note that this list is not exhaustive.

**Government-Specific Requirements:**

* Security Clearance: FSC - Secret 
* Estimated Effort: 240 days per year
* Estimated Contract Duration: January 10, 2023 - December 31, 2024, plus three (3) option years.
* Trade Agreements: CKFTA, CCFTA, CHFTA, WTO GPA, CETA, CCFTA, CFTA, CUFTA, CPFTA, Canada-UK TCA, CPTPP, Canada-Panama FTA.

**Instructions for Bidders:**

* Interested bidders must submit their proposals to the DND Point of Contact, Eugen Marinescu, at DapServicesBidReceiving-DoaServicesReceptionDesSoumissions@forces.gc.ca.
* All proposals must be submitted in one of Canada's official languages.

**Procurement Documents:**
The RFP documents will be e-mailed directly to the pre-qualified suppliers. 

**Contact Information:**
For any inquiries or questions regarding this RFP, please contact Eugen Marinescu at the above-mentioned email address.

---

### Notice End

---

### Disclaimer:
This notice is for information only and shall not be considered a solicitation to any interested supplier, except as described above. Bids received outside the scope of this notice will be returned
